text: I am new to Julia and going through the DifferentialEquations.jl Tutorial (01-ode_introduction.ipynb). How can ODEProblem know only from f if u is modifed inplace or not?

elements.text: I am new to Julia and going through the DifferentialEquations.jl Tutorial (01-ode_introduction.ipynb). How can ODEProblem know only from f if u is modifed inplace or not?

text: ..a ok... the signature of the function is different. The inplace version has du as additional parameter
